query: What is the timeline of all formal notices between parties?
output:
CLAUDE CODE ANALYSIS
Query: What is the timeline of all formal notices between parties?

RELEVANT DOCUMENT EXCERPTS:

[Full Prelim Cross List.docx, p.1]
A. Was Rivera aware of the importance of SN5174’s resale timeline?

[Full Prelim Cross List.docx, p.1]
A. Explain timeline slippage from April to December.

[Full Prelim Cross List.docx, p.1]
C. Did he coordinate repair timelines with Hassan?

[Charles Philipp Outline #1.docx, p.1]
Did you track and manage turnaround timelines for off-site components?

[Charles Philipp Outline #1.docx, p.1]
Isn’t it true that Gulfstream’s proposal gave the customer a dramatically misleading impression of the project timeline?

[Charles Philipp Outline #1.docx, p.1]
The rudder alone was tracked with multiple updates showing long turnaround timelines.

[Charles Philipp Outline #1.docx, p.1]
Are you saying you took no steps to expedite or flag the impact of Savannah-bound parts on the delivery timeline?

[Full Direct List.docx, p.1]
Clean, structured walk-through of key timeline slippages and turning points.

[2. Danny Farnham Direct Outline with Cross & Redirect.docx, p.1]
Do you believe these deficiencies materially impacted cost, timeline, and outcomes?

[4. Charles Philipp - Cross Exam & Impeachment .docx, p.1]
Strong Contradiction: Gulfstream's proposal gave CITIOM a timeline less than half of the known historical average—and you had the internal data to know better.

[Report of Preliminary Hearing and Scheduling Order (002).docx, p.1]
Direct Exchange: By agreement of the parties, the parties may communicate with the Arbitrators by email provided that the email is formatted as follows. The “subject” line of the email shall contain the CPR case name identifying the parties and the CPR case number. Each email message sent to the Arbitrators shall be simultaneously copied to opposing counsel and to the CPR case manager handling the case. Motions may be made via email without the necessity of formal pleadings, and orders of the Arbitrators may be made by simple email to the parties and the CPR. Neither the parties nor their counsel shall have ex parte communication with the Arbitrators.

[Murtaza Hassan Outline #1.docx, p.1]
So you admit the project was over 20,000 manhours beyond the quote—but that was not shared in your formal update to CITIOM?

[6. Patrick Stockton - Cross Exam & Impeachment.docx, p.1]
Did he receive any formal escalations? If not, what does that say about his team’s communication protocols?

[4. Charles Philipp - Cross Exam & Impeachment .docx, p.1]
Did you ever raise a formal objection to the lack of consistent staffing?

[1. Joe Rivera - Cross Exam & Impeachment .docx, p.1]
Goal: Undermine Rivera’s credibility as a leader by highlighting a lack of any formal response to the 10-month overrun.



Based on document search, key findings:
- Found relevant excerpts in repository documents
- See excerpts above for specific citations
